title: SMC_GetTappetValue (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GetTappetValue
This function block evaluates the output
Tappets
of function block
MC_CamIn
and contains the current tappet status.

rows.Name: Tappets
rows.Comment: Tappet signals to be evaluated byMC_GetTappetValue

rows.Name: iID
rows.Comment: Group ID of the tappet to be evaluated.

rows: Initial value of the tappet to be assigned at first call
TRUE: Sets the value of the tappet tobInitValueat a restart of theMC_CamIn`function block.FALSE: Retains the tappet value at a restart of theMC_CamInfunction block.
